summary: Aliens Pulse Rifle Flame Thrower and Smartgun
descriptionHtml:
New Flamethrower, SmartGun, and muzzle flash coming soon!

download with manager is back!

compatible with all mods REQUIRES DAWNGARD! 

press ` (console) and then type /help thrower or /help m41a or /help smart to get the id\'s then press player.additem (item id) (amount)

You should be able to craft flamethrower and m41a ammo and weapons under the dwarven section of smithing


You also need J3x scripts from his autocrossbow mod for the autofiring and the new weapons I will be adding with semi-auto effect (like m1 garand)
found here:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26329//?
author: xillus
